Name: The Gift of Greed
Requirements: Your Army must include King Midas
If your army includes this company you cannot include any LEGENDARY Formations other than King Midas.
Effect: If your army includes this company then while a Formation from this company is within 6” of King Midas then improve the armour characteristic of models in that Formation by 1. In addition, when a Formation from this Formation attempts an action while within 6” of King Midas then that action is automatically succeeded.
